Can call code in other languages: COM  .NET  WebServices  Shared Libraries  DLLs  NAG  R  JavaScript[14]

GUI creation support: GUI Widgets since v.0.9 but still incomplete

Can be called from other languages: MATLAB [34] Excel [35] VisualBasic  Java  and C[36]

Can call code in other languages: C via perlXS; C  Python  F77  etc. via Inline

Can be called from other languages: Yes (any language that can call Python)
